item.description:
Our summer picnic! Burgers/Dogs! The club will supply the basics and the essentials, if you have a specific request or requirement, let me know. Also let me know if you are coming so I can get a basic head count and get the right number of burgers/dogs + supplies!

 

Hopefully this year is better signage and look for the new inflatable penguins to mark the spot! I'll try to have someone post the geo-cordinates when we get there in the AM. 

 

Sleeping Giant has hiking, open spaces for frisbee and has several geo cache locations.

group.name: Southern CT Open Source Users Group (SCOSUG)

item.name: Summer Picnic @ Sleeping Giant State Park - 11am-3pm
